title: Informational Education Design Based on Automatic Composition Models for Ethnic Instrument Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instrumental performance skills, digital device proficiency, and foundational understanding of music theory
context.additional_context: Corporate cultural arts leadership development program. Cultivates creative expression by combining ethnic instrument performance with digital technology

learning_goals: Learners can perform ethnic musical instrument playing techniques in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can generate at least three melodic variations for ethnic instrument compositions using an automated composition model
Learners can complete at least one digital composition incorporating ethnic music elements through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
